Title: Relates to weight limits for vehicles with divisible loads operating in the city of New York
Summary: Relates to weight limits for vehicles with divisible loads operating in the city of New York; directs the New York city department of transportation, the metropolitan transportation authority and the port authority of New York to permit vehicles with valid downstate divisible load permits to be operated on highways and bridges within the city of New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง385, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to weight limits for vehicles with divisible loads operating in the city of New York; and directing the New York city department of transportation, the metropolitan transportation authority and the port authority of New York to permit vehicles with valid downstate divisible load permits to be operated on highways and bridges within the city of New York
